items.sentence: If you don\'t think the party is going to be any fun, then I don\'t want to go.
Tom became a little concerned when Mary didn\'t arrive when she said she would.
Tom fell asleep on the train and missed the station he was going to get off at.
Tom is worried that the problem may be much more serious than we first thought.
It is said that Japanese people don't celebrate Christmas the way Americans do.
